events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection, claiming initial damages.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of the incident report and customer description.
Assigned experienced auto claims agent to handle the case and ensure customer receives timely assistance.
Acknowledged receipt of claim to the customer, confirming that the process has begun and next steps outlined.
Requested the customer to submit a copy of the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and insurance documentation.
Customer provided all requested documents including police report and photographs, aiding swift progress of claim.
Initiated a detailed investigation including contacting involved parties and reviewing submitted evidence.
Completed investigation confirming the liability and extent of damage relating to the vehicle collision.
Proposed a settlement offer to the customer covering vehicle repairs and associated expenses based on investigation findings.
Customer responded with acceptance of the settlement offer and expressed appreciation for the prompt handling.
Approved the claim for payment as per the agreed settlement, marking a positive resolution for the claimant.
Payment issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover vehicle repair expenses according to settlement terms.
Closed the claim file after confirmation of customer satisfaction and completion of payment transaction.
Archived the case documentation in compliance with data retention policy for future reference if necessary.
